game.name: Natsu no Sagashimono ~What We Found That Summer~
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Summer vacation is finally here, and the next few weeks promise to be anything but uneventful! Natsu has just 30 days to acclimate to life in the countryside, help the locals face their demons, find that special someone, and gain the self-confidence to return home with his head held high!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Summer vacation is finally here, and the next few weeks promise to be anything but uneventful! Natsu has just 30 days to acclimate to life in the countryside, help the locals face their demons, find that special someone, and gain the self-confidence to return home with his head held high!

reviewHighlights.text: 한달이 이렇게 짧은 줄 모르고 울었다. 여름이었다.
연출, 스토리 둘다 좋다 그런데 조작 및 게임진행시 시간이 좀 걸린다. 무튼 좋은 작품임
